github-actions[bot] commented on Issue #1963:

Subscribe to Label Action

cc @bnjbvr

fitzgen commented on Issue #1963:

Note that while I agree that this is a nice convenience, there is no risk of desynchronizing versions: if you had the wrong versions, then the compiler would catch it for you and report errors.
